name: Carpacker
description:
This is a part of my thesis about rapid prototyping, so any feedback is highly appreciated. I used free assets and CC0 content for the graphics as well as the terrain generator.

How to play: 

Tap the object on the top side of the screen and tap again to drop it on the vehicle. Try to balance all the objects to the goal.

Assets i used for this project:

Mobile Game Graphics: Parallax backgrounds
https://opengameart.org/content/3-parallax-backgrounds

Neil Meredith: Endless-2D Terrain Generator
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/sprite-management/endless-2d-terrain...

Devil's Work.shop: Low Poly Cars
https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/3d-low-poly-car-game-asset-pack-vehicles-free

galangpiliang: Star Vector
https://opengameart.org/content/star-vector

SpriteAttack: Boxes and Crates
https://opengameart.org/content/boxes-and-crates-svg-and-pngs

Kvazi: 2D Room
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-room-119508

surt: Plums
https://opengameart.org/content/plums
